Text.Language: Oukat/,/cic n~te peniwt eyouab abba Iwann/c pi,~rucoctomoc: e~re pefc~mou eyouab swpi neman: a~m/n.
A homily of our holy father Abba John Chrysostom. May his holy blessings be with us. Amen.
